posts._title: Amitabh Reza Chowdhury – Aynabaji AKA Mirror Game (2016)
posts.title: Aynabaji
posts.excerpt: Plot:Ayna is an actor and the prison is his stage. He slips into the characters of the powerful convicted in exchange of money and take their place in prison. This strange profession is borne out of a society that doesn’t give him a chance to follow his passion of acting, but forces him to act …

Meanwhile, the twenty years old Lisa (Anna Thalbach), who is disturbed with the suicide of her …

posts._title: Manole Marcus – Actorul si salbaticii AKA The Actor and the Savages (1975)
posts.title: Actorul si salbaticii
posts.excerpt: Defying threats coming from leaders of the fascist Iron Guard movement, music-hall comedian and theatre manager Costica Caratase (whos character is based on legendary real-life actor and theatre director Constantin Tanas) prepares his new show – a satirical musical comedy that pokes fun at The Iron Guard and Nazi Germany. A day before the premiere, …

posts.title: Technoboss
posts.excerpt: Quote:The start of Luís Rovisco’s old age isn’t exactly cheerful. Already in his sixties, he’s still roaming the country by himself, carrying out his tasks — increasingly less real — as sales director for the company SegurVale. Sadness, resignation? Not with the songs Luís makes up behind the wheel, and that take over this film …

posts._title: Hanyi Zhang – Zhi fan ye mao AKA Life After Life (2016)
posts.title: Zhi fan ye mao
posts.excerpt: The spirit of a deceased mother takes over her son’s body in order to oversee the task of replanting a very important tree, only after which it will be able to leave the earthly limits.

posts._title: Juliet Berto & Jean-Henri Roger – Cap Canaille (1983)
posts.title: Cap Canaille
posts.excerpt: Marseille, the 80s. Criminal fires, real estate business.A burnt hill belongs to Paula Baretto, her only goods and heritage from her murdered father, ex-chemist of the French Connection…

posts._title: Olivier Assayas – Après mai AKA Something in the Air (2012)
posts.title: Après mai
posts.excerpt: Quote:In the months after the heady weeks of May ’68, a group of young Europeans search for a way to continue the revolution believed to be just beginning.

posts.title: Zig zig
posts.excerpt: The story of two singers/prostitutes that dream of a big house, 160kg former opera diva/wife of an ex-minister of Agriculture that was kidnapped, a police captain with a tapeworm, a rock band that want to become famous, an ex-police captain with a chiken egg under his armpit and many others intresting persons…

posts._title: Tetsuya Mariko – Miyamoto kara Kimi e AKA From Miyamoto to You (2019)
posts.title: Miyamoto kara Kimi e
posts.excerpt: SYNOPSISFollowing the manga series and the subsequent television serial of the same name, and featuring the same cast, a young and relatively inexperienced man comes across a woman during his working day and sparks fly.

posts._title: Bill Moyers – Joseph Campbell and the Power of Myth (1988)
posts.title: Joseph Campbell and the Power of Myth
posts.excerpt: Mythologist Joseph Campbell presents his ideas about comparative mythology and the ongoing role of myth in human society.
